tns:cachedXpathResult.tns:name: issueNumber
tns:cachedXpathResult.tns:xpath: concat( substring(concat('Elektor Magazin ', substring-after(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), '/', substring-after(substring-before(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), 'e ')), 1, number(contains(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], 'e')) * string-length(concat('Elektor Magazin ', substring-after(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), '/', substring-after(substring-before(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), 'e ')))), substring(concat('Elektor Industry ', substring-after(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), '/', substring-after(substring-before(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), 'i ')), 1, number(not(contains(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], 'e'))) * string-length(concat('Elektor Industry ', substring-after(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), '/', substring-after(substring-before(//html:p[contains(@class, 'Magazine__month')], '-'), 'i ')))) )
